title: Best Television Plays
additional-note: The renewals listed here are the earliest we found mentioning Best Television Plays in the registered works database, or in the Books or Periodicals sections of the CCE.  It is possible that prior collections, or the plays in them, were registered and renewed under Drama, either as part of this series or as earlier publications.  We have not systematically checked for such renewals.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
